Uses of Class
io.jeo.vector.SchemaBuilder

  • Packages that use SchemaBuilder 
    Package Description
    io.jeo.vector
    Vector data model.

    • Uses of SchemaBuilder in io.jeo.vector

      Methods in io.jeo.vector that return SchemaBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SchemaBuilder Schema.build(String name)
      Returns a new schema builder.
      SchemaBuilder SchemaBuilder.crs(org.osgeo.proj4j.CoordinateReferenceSystem crs)
      Sets the projection of the schema.
      SchemaBuilder SchemaBuilder.crs(String srs)
      Sets the projection of the schema.
      SchemaBuilder SchemaBuilder.field(Field fld)
      Adds a field to the schema being built.
      SchemaBuilder SchemaBuilder.field(String name, Class<?> type)
      Adds a field to the schema being built.
      SchemaBuilder SchemaBuilder.field(String name, Class<? extends Geometry> type, org.osgeo.proj4j.CoordinateReferenceSystem crs)
      Adds a geometry field to the schema being built.
      SchemaBuilder SchemaBuilder.field(String name, Class<? extends Geometry> type, String crs)
      Adds a geometry field to the schema being built.
      SchemaBuilder SchemaBuilder.fields(Feature f)
      Adds fields to the schema derived from the attributes of the specified feature.
      SchemaBuilder SchemaBuilder.fields(Iterable<Field> flds)
      Adds a collection/iterable of fields to the schema being built.
      SchemaBuilder SchemaBuilder.fields(String spec)
      Adds fields to the schema being built described by a GeoTools style schema specification of the form:
      SchemaBuilder SchemaBuilder.property(String key, Object value)
      Adds a property to be set on the next field.
      SchemaBuilder SchemaBuilder.uri(String uri)
      Sets the namespace of the schema.
